title: Make it happen.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
To whom it may concern, if you have not noticed already, there could potentially be a LPL All-Star lineup that consists of the 5 former world champion Samsung White members. This needs to happen, it's been quite some time since this team played together and the team we saw in 2014 is a top team that has ever played together in league of legends. 

During your voting on for the 2016 all-stars when you get to the LPL do this, all votes matter

replies.body:
I didnt vote for Imp 

I dislike him
I am not an imp fan, just a fan of the old teams/players, especially SSW as a whole. If not for the SSW all-star reunion I'd have voted Uzi because he is my favorite ADC ever
